content: Yes, it’s true that Zdravko wrote such a great article while Emma focused her attention just on that minimal mistake, but the best part is that Zdravko’s response was so humble and elegant and Emma recognized her mistake and at the end, from both sides, we received a nice lesson about humbleness. I love that! P.S. I’m not trying to be ironic, but if you find a mistake/typo in my writing please be aware that English is not my mother tongue. Thanks!
